## Merge noc heights with an altered, height merge function. 

This works but I need to disaggregate the heights first. 
```{r}
tile<-brick("DATA/SanMiguel_West/Tiffs/SM_GypsumGapNW_0103_180611.tif")
height<-raster("DATA/NOC_heights/San_Miguel_West_Raster/SM_GYPSUMGAPNW_0103_180611_dz.tif")
tile[[1]]

compareRaster(height, tile, extent = FALSE, rowcaol = FALSE, crs = T, showwarning = F)

height_test<-height_merge("DATA/SanMiguel_West/Tiffs/SM_GypsumGapNW_0103_180611.tif", height)

```
